name: Integer
description: A whole number (integer number), like 3 or -1. Numbers such as 0.3 or 5.5 are not allowed, those would be [Floats](float.md).

example.example_description: A [Set On Fire (Entity Action Type)](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_action_types/set_on_fire/) that has a `duration` value of 3, which is a whole number.
